tasks.task: Create an indoor herb garden in water
subtasks: Find healthy fresh cuttings of herbs
Remove all leaves except a few at the top
Submerge cuttings in clean water
Ensure proper lighting for each herb (e.g., basil, rosemary, thyme)
Change water every few days
Add hydroponic nutrients if necessary

tasks.task: Share experiences with growing herbs in comments
subtasks: Observe plant growth and health
Post positive/negative experiences as feedback
Visit the channel's page and click subscribe
Interact with video by clicking the thumbs up button
